## Plotly Sample

<br>

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
p <- ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = cut, fill = clarity)) +
            geom_bar(position = "dodge")
ggplotly(p)
```


```{r, message = FALSE}
d <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 500), ]
plot_ly(d, x = d$carat, y = d$price, 
        text = paste("Clarity: ", d$clarity),
        mode = "markers", color = d$carat, size = d$carat)
```
